div.p: The method of collection for the specimen. This is a set of codes defined here. An alternative is to use all SNOMED CT Codes derived from 17636008
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0488
